title: Family Therapy(TEFC)
creator_credit: Francis Sealey, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Looks at the way problems of individuals are often caused and maintained by their role in the family, Shows examples of some families in counselling sessions and the techniques used by therapists to help the family as a whole
